prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with sleek black fur and bright blue accents.
I want a Pokemon that has a star-shaped tail and striking yellow eyes.
Generate a unique bipedal creature that blends elements of feline and electric.
Make a small, agile Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that has distinctive yellow stripes and a playful demeanor.
Design an electric feline Pokemon that can navigate through both grasslands and caves.
Show me a Pokemon with a spiky tail and a combination of blue and black fur.
